title: Subpart 30-3 - Annual Teacher and Principal Evaluations for the 2019-20 through the 2031-2032 School Year
content:

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 30-3.1 - [Effective until 4/3/2025] Applicability
